# GitHub Account Preference

**This Repository**: https://github.com/goldeneye
**Repository Name**: claude-code-baseline

---

## Important Note for Future Projects

**ALWAYS ASK** which GitHub account to use before configuring remotes:

### Available Accounts

1. **goldeneye** (Company/Professional)
   - URL: https://github.com/goldeneye
   - Use for: Professional projects, company work, public baseline repositories

2. **Personal Account** (Private/Personal)
   - Use for: Personal projects, private experiments, separate work

---

## Workflow for New Projects

When creating a new project or setting up Git:

1. ✅ Ask: "Which GitHub account should this use?"
2. ✅ Options: goldeneye (company) or personal account
3. ✅ Configure the correct remote based on response
4. ✅ Verify with GitHub Desktop which account is active

---

## This Repository Configuration

```bash
# Current configuration
git remote -v
# origin  https://github.com/goldeneye/claude-code-baseline.git (fetch)
# origin  https://github.com/goldeneye/claude-code-baseline.git (push)

# Branch: main
# Account: goldeneye
```
